transcription_link: mySTATINN - Remote Helpers - 2025/07/29 13:47 EEST - Notes by Gemini
email_content:
Hi Pav,

I hope you've been doing well!

I wanted to stay in touch and reconnect after our last conversation about mySTATINN and your search for a dedicated in-house specialist experienced with Google, Meta, LinkedIn, and TikTok advertising, as well as email campaigns in Mailchimp.

From our side, Remote Helpers can provide:
üí° Full-time digital advertising specialists ‚Äî managing Meta, Google, and LinkedIn Ads campaigns, tracking performance, and optimizing targeting.
üìß Email marketing experts ‚Äî setting up and automating campaigns in Mailchimp (or HubSpot alternatives) with segmentation, reporting, and analytics.
‚öôÔ∏è Flexible engagement ‚Äî full-time, part-time, or trial-based collaboration to ensure the right fit before scaling.

If you're still looking to bring this position in-house, I'd be happy to share a few updated CVs and work samples for review and schedule a short follow-up call to discuss options.

üìÖ Would Tuesday or Wednesday at 12:00 or 1:00 PM your time work for you?
You can also explore our services and available specialists at https://rh-s.com/app

Looking forward to hearing from you,
